name: EnglandIdentifierNHSNumber
title: England Identifier NHS Number
description:
Only traced NHS Number **SHOULD** be used, un-traced NHS Numbers **MUST** be clearly indicated.
 
 NHS Data Dictionary [NHS NUMBER](https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/nhs_number.html)
 
 Format: NNNNNNNNNN (400 000 000 to 499 999 999, and 600 000 000 to 799 999)


| Name                | HL7 FHIR Identifier | HL7 FHIR Value                                   | HL7 v2 CX | HL7 v2 Value | OID                       |
|--
| Identifier          | identifier.value    | {NHSNumber}                                      | CX.1      | {NHSNumber}  |                           |
| Assigning Authority | identifier.system   | https://fhir.nhs.uk/Id/nhs-number                | CX.4      | NHS          | 2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.4.1 |
| Identifier Code     | identifier.type     | http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0203#NH | CX.5      | NH           |                           |
purpose: This documents NHS England Data Dictionary and HL7 definitions
